meanings.definition: The grassroots political activists who communicate via the internet.
meanings.sent1: The netroots organized an online campaign to raise awareness about environmental issues.
meanings.sent2: Many netroots members use social media to connect and discuss political strategies.
meanings.sent3: The netroots group shared funny memes to engage more people in their cause.
meanings.sent4: The netroots movement spread like wildfire across the digital landscape.
meanings.sent5: Joining the netroots felt like being part of a powerful online community.

meanings.definition: The online community of progressive political activists.
meanings.sent1: She found support and inspiration within the netroots community.
meanings.sent2: The netroots platform provided a space for like-minded individuals to collaborate.
meanings.sent3: The netroots members celebrated their online victories with virtual high-fives.
meanings.sent4: The influence of the netroots extended far beyond the digital realm.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the netroots gave her a sense of belonging and purpose.
